thread.title: See What Celebrities Wore to the Oscars 2017 After-Party (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: See What Celebrities Wore to the Oscars 2017 After-Party (PHOTOS)

author: Chelsea Peng
title: See What Celebrities Wore to the Oscars 2017 After-Party (PHOTOS)
text:
view gallery 37 Photos 
Ain't no party like an Oscars after-party, where the fashion is what some people ought to/wish they could've worn to the real thing . Ahead, photos of what the stars changed into to celebrate a win, forget a loss, or just generally to let loose. More
